title: Devon DeLapp
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001259/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001259/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Devon DeLapp**

Devon DeLapp (1981-) studied type design under [Karen Cheng](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001259/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Karen%20Cheng) at the [University of Washington](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001259/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20Washington). His first publicly available typeface, [Gaq](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001259/http:/www.devondelapp.com/design/type/), was released in 2006.
author: ddelapp
